replies.body: I'm wanting to get onto my item sets but I can't find them, can you help me out?
Agreed, I would love to have Item Sets back!
Please, please can we have Item Sets back? Also Bot games so we can practice for those who are unable to open the legacy client. More information on Stats screen for healing/assists to help Supports.
Will a thing be implemented to show how much game time you have?? i really want to actually know instead of estimations
